long_description: Attach the Princeton Tec Point Hat-Clip light to the brim of your cap and enjoy hands-free lighting for any number of tasks. The light has a flexible neck so you can direct light wherever you need it. White LED is recessed into the rugged aluminum head, providing directional light that's great for reading, looking at a map and other close- to mid-range activities. LED outputs 10 lumens. At just 0.6 oz, the weight of the Princeton Tec Point Hat-Clip light is barely detectable when it's clipped on the brim of your hat. IPX7 rating ensures protection against water down to 1m for up to 30 min. Operates on 2 CR2016 lithium coin cell batteries (included); batteries provide 36 hrs. of use.
short_description: Attach the Princeton Tec Point Hat-Clip light to the brim of your cap and enjoy hands-free lighting for any number of tasks. The light has a flexible neck so you can direct light wherever you need it.
